Selecting a Grade-Level Resource

MeL is full of resources that cater to learners of all ages, packed with engaging and informative content that can captivate curious minds. Each resource is carefully curated to suit a particular age group, providing content and appropriate navigation support to young learners.

We understand that choosing the right eResource is important. That's why we're here to help! We've selected two resources in this module and invite you to focus on the resource that aligns most with your work and the grade level group of the students you support. 

We recommend finding the grade level group you primarily support and exploring the resource content aligned to that selection.

Navigation Note

Once you have clicked one of the following buttons, the navigation will change slightly for the rest of this module. Be sure to follow the directions and use the buttons at the bottom of the following pages to either move ahead or return to a previous page within each topic instead of using the arrows at the top right of your screen.
